alert.note: Alert for Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Southern Liberty (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:12PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Chambers, southwestern Liberty and eastern Harris Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 912 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Lake Houston Dam, or 7 miles southeast of Humble, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pasadena, Baytown, Deer Park, South Houston, Humble, Galena Park, Jacinto City, Beach City, Cloverleaf, Channelview, Highlands, Barrett, Greater Hobby Area, Kingwood, northern South Belt / Ellington, Crosby, Morgan`s Point, Golfcrest / Bellfort / Reveille, Harrisburg / Manchester and Park Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Chambers; Coastal Harris; Inland Harris; Southern Liberty
